Name: 群侠传，启动！
About the game: The Legend of the Swordsmen, Launch! is an open source martial arts RPG framework designed to pay homage to the classic game 'The Legend of the Golden Age' and provide a platform for fans of such games to create and exchange ideas. You can experience the sample project 'The Soul of a Wandering City' in this game, playing the role of a soul crossing possessed by a small beggar 'Mo through the forest' to solve the mystery of his death. You can also use this framework to create game mods and upload them to Creative Works. Everything is free, pure eternal love to generate electricity. Anyone who is interested is very welcome to join. However, you are not allowed to use any materials or resources (including commercial/non-commercial) of this project without permission! Otherwise will be on the project's list of shame. Specific attention can be paid to the open source page in the relevant open source agreement. Sample game 'Duocheng Remnant Soul Biography' game content: - Approximately 2-3 hours of main game experience, leading to a final pass and solving the mystery of your death and the conspiracy that lies beneath that mystery - More than 2 game endings - 5 teammates with different styles to join - More than 10 learnable martial arts - Hundreds of different items
